title: vivo V21 5G (Arctic White, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, USB Cable, Earphone, Earphone Jack Adapter, Sim Eject Tool, Case, Warranty Card, Quick Guide
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90Hz Refresh Rate,180Hz Touch Sampling Rate, Schott Xensation UP Display Protection
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 64MP (f/1.79 Aperture, OIS) + 8MP Wide-Angle (f/2.2 Aperture) + 2MP Macro (f/2.2 Aperture), Features: OIS, 4K Video, Motion Autofocus, Eye Autofocus, Body Autofocus, Object Autofocus, Night, Ultra-Wide Night, Tripod Night, Ultra Stable Video, Art Portrait Video, Super Macro, Bokeh Portrait, Multi-Style Portrait
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 44MP Front Camera, f/2.0 Aperture, Features: OIS, Autofocus, Night, AI Night Portrait, Eye Autofocus, 4K Video, Ultra Stable Video, Light Filters, Kid Face Beauty, Beauty Mark Retention, Head Slimming, Double Exposure, Video Face Beauty, Dual-View Video
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-compass, Fingerprint Sensor (In-Display), Gyroscope
product_specification.Audio Formats: WAV, MP3, MP2, MIDI, Vorbis, APE, FLAC
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year for Handset and 6 Months for In-box Accessories

product_description.44 MP OIS Night Selfie: Click and share clear and bright selfies even in dark environments, thanks to the 44 MP OIS Night Selfie camera. Also, this front camera has an Optimal Image Stabilization technology to let you click stable selfies.
product_description.Spotlight Selfie: To improve the quality of selfies clicked in low-light conditions, the front camera has a Dual Selfie Spotlight feature.
product_description.Dual-View Video: You can capture videos with dual perspectives by rolling both the rear and front cameras simultaneously. So, you can use this phone to create impressive videos.
product_description.Ultra Slim Design: This is a stylish and sleek smartphone that features 2.5D screen curves. Also, it is about 7.29-mm thin and weighs about 176 g. Thus, it is a feather-light smartphone that you can conveniently carry around.
product_description.AG Matte Glass: Apart from adding a touch of luxury, the AG Matte Glass cover also offers a comfortable experience for your fingers.
product_description.64 MP OIS Night Camera: The 64 MP OIS Night Camera unveils stunning details while the supporting rear cameras let you explore wide perspectives, artistic styles, and super macro details.
product_description.Double Exposure: You can create surreal art-like pictures using this feature that lets you click two photos in one.
product_description.Extended RAM: Using an additional 3 GB of ROM space for its RAM, this smartphone ensures that your favourite apps run fast without lag.
product_description.E3 AMOLED FHD+ Display: This smartphone features a 6.35 cm (6.44) E3 AMOLED FHD+ Display that offers you vibrant and authentic shades for your visual delight.
product_description.MediaTek Dimensity 800U 5G-enabled Proce: This smartphone is powered by a 7nm Octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 800U processor that delivers a smooth mobile computing experience. So, from opening apps quickly to easy multitasking, you can do a lot on this smartphone.
product_description.33W FlashCharge and 4000 mAh Battery: The 33W FlashCharge technology and 4000 mAh battery together ensure that your smartphone battery does not run out easily, and you stay connected without interruptions.

Stunning device. Camera is really very good and Vivo has a name for camera but they should have offered a telephoto with this device. Phone very fast, very smooth. Mediatek Dimensity 800 is a sharp processor. Battery? Playing games for 3 1/2 hours at 100%. Now after 3 and 1/2 hours 65%. Selfie camera is superb. Unparallel. First and foremost this is a phone for camera buffs. Photos from the main camera are very clean and neat. The macro camera is cool but the images are over sharpened, so it doesn't give a realistic look.
The phone looks cool.
A clear case is included and a screen protector is pre applied.
33W charging is helpful, battery tops up completely in a hour.
Screen colours, brightness is good.
Under screen fingerprint sensor is quite responsive.
Front camera is good. Front flash is quite effective and you can take selfies even in dark.

Things i didn't like
Vivo apps cannot be Uninstalled and many cannot be disabled.
Not for intensive games.
In my old phones when power was running out and phone was abou to switch off, I would get a warning. No such warning in this. Just goes off.
In menu, if I want to search for an app, I have to scroll. No search option or alphabet choices in size to help with faster navigation.

It's a Average Smart Phone. Camera Quality is Good but not a very high quality. It's main feature is Front Camera with dual Flash. Display also Good. But App Icon is Small and Rounded, I am unhappy with that. Key Board is Small as compared to my Previous Honor 8X. Hybrid Sim slot is a Disadvantage, I can't put my 128 GB memory card with dual Sim. Battery is Average. Looks & Weight is Very attractive. Within 1.20 Hrs Battery Fully Charged from 10%. Price is Little Bit More in my Point of View....

As expected vivo has made great 5 device which has all features.Super design & elite look,front camera dual spotlight flash very amazing,Good camera,good performance,good network speed than other smartphones.Battery is good.Mic is good But vivo need to improve speaker's sound quality for call & music..Over all 9 points out of 10. love it..

You just have to live everything about this phone. The look, performance,build, display,software and everything. The camera is the best one i had ever seen in a phone which in my opinion is better than the latest iPhone as of now. There are only two things that I wish were different about this phone.
1. The battery. 4000mah is not something you would expect to have in Phone of this range. It should have been a bit more like 4500mah.
2. This is specific to vivo users only. The latest funtouch OS is very different from its previous versions. The shortcut center of the previous versions (mine was vivo v15) was such a great feature that came in handy. There
used to be only notifications in the notification bar ,all the shortcuts used to be in the shortcut center which you had to drag from the feature. It was a cool feature and takes time to get used to the new one.

The notch (water drop design at the top) looks a bit weird for the people who used popup camera phones which has the true infinity display. You'll need some time to get used to it too. It's only been two weeks tho since the time I bought the phone. I'll use it for considerable amount of time and edit my review again.

I bought it considering it to be great camera phone, but it turned out to be a disappointment.

Body - It felt good, but side frame is plastic which indeed feels cheap. An Aluminum frame could have done much better.

Display - Its really, which is expected from a AMOLED panel. But the fingerprint scanner is slow, which is also expected from an indisplay scanner.

Camera - Not satisfied. My primary requirement is camera and I am disappointed from its performance. Photos are not coming out to be natural, they are being digitally enhanced. When we zoom in, you won't see much details. Front camera with OIS does not justify its hype. EIS in many phones is better than V21's OIS.

Processing - Performance is also not worth the money and the reason might be the processon. Snapdragon is way better than its competition. RAM management is good though.

Battery - It is decent and the charging is also very fast.

Camera is good. But not as per expectation.. Especially considering this as camera centric phone.
Wide angle lens does the job but quality could have been better
Macro lens is of no use.
Primary lens is good but behaves abnormally when it sees human face. It adjusts the picture which you won't probably like.
Selfie camera is very good and does the job efficiently.

Operating system:
The look of os is very bad
It is user friendly..as such no issues are there in using but you expect the colour combination/overall looks of what you're operating to be better. I'm sure you'll find it a bit disappointing.
Display is very good.
You'll find the screen colour to be yellowish. However, you can adjust the white temperature but at the lowest point also you'll feel little yellowish colour. This is as per personal taste but I felt this yellowish colour not satisfying.

Almost all the available themes are payable. So if you're theme lover who wants to change looks by frequently changing themes, you'll find it annoying.

Others:
Phone is very fast, connectivity is very good. Fingerprint sensor does the job fast if not very fast like Mi back sensor. Face detection is really good.

Speaker: very disappointing at this price point. How can you provide single speaker. Come on..

This product comes with wired earphone who's sound is good. Comfort level is not ok at least with me. It hurts however I don't use it as I have other option.

Overall if you are spending above 30K you can have better phone in this market.

EIS present here not OIS, I felt cheated by it.

The OIS that is present in the camera is actually a software based output rather than a lens or hardware based. Dont believe me, try turning ultra stable on off, you will see that the camera zooms in when ultra stable is on which means it crops the image or video to make it seems that it's stable now. This is not OIS rather EIS which is present in cheap phones.

Extended ram is a scam because if you use part of your rom as ram then basically it will slow down your phone as ram is much much faster then rom.

pros.Spotlight Selfie: The dual spotlight feature of the 44MP front camera is amazing and captures memorable pictures at night.
pros.Performance: The octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 800U processor is sharp and delivers a smooth mobile computing experience.
pros.Camera: The tripe rear camera setup captures stunning pictures whereas the OIS night camera helps in capturing the intricate details. Overall terrific camera quality.
pros.Design: This phone is super stylish, has a beautiful design and a premium look. It is lightweight and easy to use.

cons.4000 mAh Battery: 4000 mAh battery is not expected in such a price range. The battery power should have been more.
cons.Price: The phone is priced a bit higher than the features offered.

summary.verdict: The vivo V21 5G is one of the best pick for selfie lovers as it comes with some amazing camera setup.
summary.Additional Information: In display fingerprint scanner, Dual sim slot, 8GB RAM, VoLte supported.
